scripts.build: vite build && mkdir -p ../webroot/old_assets && mv ../webroot/js/main-script.js ../webroot/old_assets/js_csga_main-script.js 2>/dev/null || true && mv ../webroot/css/main-style.css ../webroot/old_assets/js_csga_main-style.css 2>/dev/null || true && cp dist/main-script.js ../webroot/js/main-script.js && cp dist/main-style.css ../webroot/css/main-style.css
